participant_1.background:
I try to stay in touch with my family as often as I can.
I'm a teacher who enjoys baking, but keeps it a secret from my parents.
I'm still trying to find my new routine, but I'm trying to focus on spending more time with my family and friends, and I'm also trying to find a new job that I'm passionate about.
I'm trying to get my mother to love me.
I am afraid of not being able to provide for my family.

participant_2.background:
My wife doesn't like me anymore, but at least I'm getting used to my new beard.
I take care of my appearance, but I'm not a slave to it.
I love hanging out with my girlfriend and listening to death metal.
I'm not a morning person, but I love going hiking with my friends.
My favorite thing about my job is the free cupcakes.

content.text: Hey! What's up?
Not much, just hanging out and listening to death metal.
Nice! I'm a big fan of death metal too. What bands do you listen to?
I like Cannibal Corpse, Deicide, Obituary, and Morbid Angel.
Awesome! I love those bands too. I'm also a big fan of Death and Obituary.
Oh, nice! I've never really listened to Death, but I've heard good things about them.
You should definitely check them out. They're one of my favorite bands.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh, cool! I'm a teacher.
Really? What grade do you teach?
I teach kindergarten.
Oh, that's awesome! I love kids.
Me too! They're so much fun to be around.
I bet! So, what's your favorite thing about being a teacher?
I love seeing the kids learn and grow. It's so rewarding to see them make progress.
That's awesome! I'm sure it's a great feeling.
It is! So, what's your favorite thing about being a software engineer?
I love the problem solving aspect of it. I also like the creative aspect of coming up with new solutions to problems.
That sounds really interesting! I'm not very good at math, so I don't think I would be very good at being a software engineer.
You don't have to be good at math to be a software engineer. You just need to be good at problem solving and logic.
Oh, okay! I might have to look into that as a career option.
You should! It's a great field to be in.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm going to have to think about it
